com.vernalis.rcsb.io.helpers

Class PDBIOHelperFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vernalis.rcsb.io.helpers.PDBIOHelperFunctions

  • public class PDBIOHelperFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class providing helper functions for downloading PDB files.
    Author:
    Stephen Roughley

      Helper function to create the correct download urls for the following file types FASTA Sequence, PDB, mmCIF, StructureFactor, PDBML/XML, with optional use of gzip archive if appropriate

    • Method Detail

      • createRCSBUrl

        public static java.lang.String createRCSBUrl(java.lang.String pdbid,
                                             java.lang.String filetype,
                                             java.lang.Boolean gz)
        Helper function to create the correct download urls for the following file types FASTA Sequence, PDB, mmCIF, StructureFactor, PDBML/XML, with optional use of gzip archive if appropriate
        Parameters:
        pdbid - The 4-character PDB structure ID
        filetype - The required filetype Valid options are FASTA, PDB, MMCIF, CIF, STRUCTUREFACTOR, SF, PDBML, PDBML/XML, XML (case insensitive)
        gz - If true, then use the gzipped format for download
        Returns:
        A valid url to the required file in the correct format for downloading from the RCSB PDB

      • createRCSBUrl

        public static java.lang.String createRCSBUrl(java.lang.String pdbid,
                                             java.lang.String filetype)
        Helper function to create the correct download urls for the following file types FASTA Sequence, PDB, mmCIF, StructureFactor, PDBML/XML. gzipped archives are assumed
        Parameters:
        pdbid - The 4-character PDB structure ID
        filetype - The required filetype Valid options are FASTA, PDB, MMCIF, CIF, STRUCTUREFACTOR, SF, PDBML, PDBML/XML, XML (case insensitive)
        Returns:
        A valid url to the required file in the correct format for downloading from the RCSB PDB

      • createRCSBUrl

        public static java.lang.String createRCSBUrl(java.lang.String pdbid)
        Helper function to create the correct download urls. PDB filetype and gzipped archives are assumed
        Parameters:
        pdbid - The 4-character PDB structure ID
        Returns:
        A valid url to the required file in the correct format for downloading from the RCSB PDB
